submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        res = 0
        horizontalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        verticalCut.sort(reverse=True)
        
        h_w, v_w = 1, 1
        i, j = 0, 0
        
        while i < m - 1 and j < n - 1:
            if verticalCut[j] > horizontalCut[i]:
                res += verticalCut[j] * h_w
                v_w += 1
                j += 1
            else:
                res += horizontalCut[i] * v_w
                h_w += 1
                i += 1
        
        rem = 0
        while j < n - 1:
            rem += verticalCut[j]
            j += 1
        res += rem * h_w
                
        rem = 0
        while i < m - 1:
            rem += horizontalCut[i]
            i += 1
        res += rem * v_w
        
        return res
